mapper.select: SELECT exam.id as examTbl_id, exam.question, exam.answer FROM exam JOIN recruitment ON exam.recruitment_id = recruitment.id JOIN applicant ON recruitment.id = applicant.recruitment_id WHERE applicant.apt_id = #{apt_id} AND applicant.member_id = #{member_id};

SELECT count(*) as count FROM exam JOIN recruitment ON exam.recruitment_id = recruitment.id JOIN applicant ON recruitment.id = applicant.recruitment_id WHERE applicant.apt_id = #{apt_id} AND applicant.member_id = #{member_id};

SELECT exam.id AS examTbl_id, applicant.apt_id FROM member JOIN applicant ON member.id = applicant.member_id JOIN recruitment ON applicant.recruitment_id = recruitment.id JOIN exam ON recruitment.id = exam.recruitment_id WHERE member.id = #{member_id};
